intro_sequence: This companion app simulates a Tarkov-like extraction loop
You will embark on timed Raids to scavenge supplies,
complete contracts, and manage your Hideout economy.
Death in a Raid has consequences.

innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
innkeeper.title: Bartender
innkeeper.description: Runs the Salty Atom. Knows everyone, sees everything.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to the Salty Atom. Keep your weapons holstered.
dialogue.intro: Need a room? Or just here to drink away the radiation?
dialogue.rent_room: Room's yours. Try not to die in your sleep.

dialogue.greeting: Knowledge is the only currency that matters.
dialogue.intro: I hear whispers from the wastes. For a price, I can share them.
dialogue.sold_out: The wires are quiet today. Check back later.
dialogue.purchase: A wise investment. Here is the dossier.

fence.name: The Fence
fence.title: Black Market Dealer
fence.description: Buys what others won't. No questions asked.

dialogue.greeting: Keep your voice down. You verify the goods?
dialogue.intro: I buy the hot stuff. Weapons, tech, chemicals. If you want to sell, show me. If you want to buy, be quick.
dialogue.refresh: Fine. Let's see what else I have in the back.

dialogue.greeting: Got caps? I got goods. Simple as that.
dialogue.intro: What do you need? Ammo, stims, or just a friendly face?
dialogue.insurance_start: Do you offer any guarantees on gear?
dialogue.insurance_intro: I can set up a recovery network for your gear, but I need you to clear a supply route first. It's dangerous work, but the peace of mind is worth it.
dialogue.insurance_unlocked: The network is live. For a fee, I can ensure your gear finds its way back to you if things go south.
